EN:
Today, Taiza wants to have a different Chinese food, and chose the AGUSTO Italian cuisine in Neihu as a busy dating restaurant.As a result, many interesting plots appeared during the meal, huh

First of all, Taiza binds ahead in advance at 1 pm.Although the reservation has been confirmed the day before, after entering the restaurant, we even stood at the door for a long time, and no one came to say hello.I saw us obviously, but the three service staff at the front desk seemed to be too busy, and it actually made us wait embarrassed at the door.People who do nâ€™t know think I am a wealthy cat in your restaurant, haha!The evaluation of this restaurant is so high, how can it be like this?

After ordering a few cuisines, we found that the restaurant chef did be attentive.The 699 yuan Lym Vodka lamb, which is tender and full of taste, and has a good treatment.The 399 yuan Japan Hyogo fire roasted oyster (raw food grade) is also very good, and the mouth is full of fresh taste.Others such as 299 yuan salmon waist fruit salad (fresh lettuce and salmon), 300 yuan of beef -skinned pizza (high saltiness and slightly burnt at the bottom), these dishes are actually not very picky!
If you want to make suggestions, since your restaurant sells wine to make money, can you strengthen the education and training of the people outside the field?Today I ordered 2 oysters and wanted to match white wine. As a result, you put a cup of 180 yuan, the wine body was scattered, and only the scent of wine.When I drank the first bite, I immediately reacted to replace it, but the service staff may be misunderstood and brought a small box of appearance (it should be an aluminum foil packaging), and told me that this wine can be durable and absolutely no problem.As a consumer, I hope that the staff of the field can understand more: when consumers ask questions, you should provide solutions for problems, not hastily!

Finally, we spent nearly 3,000 yuan in this meal.I hope that when you have the opportunity to visit your restaurant again, you can be more patient and careful, I believe it will be better!

Finding this restaurant on Google for the first time on Valentine's Day and dinner for the first time, and found that it is really a recommended restaurant!It's hard to have a good atmosphere in Taipei, high CP value, beautiful meals, good meals, and thoughtful restaurants
Miss Hu and Miss Lu's services are very thoughtful and considerate, and there is also a slightly older employee who is slightly older (it seems to be a semi -inner field) is also very cute!Bleak

EN:
Augusto Augusto

High indoor space, simple large.

Stir -grilled white wine stir -fry the vegetables. The sauce is very delicious on the vegetables. The grilled cheese is a bit extra.

South American black truffle potato strips, you can eat the soft and soft texture of the outer crispy, and the oily fragrance is full of oral cavity. It is also delicious with loose laying eggplant sauce.

Provence's small round method, the golden and fluffy bread has a faint wheat aroma. It is slightly bitter but not too hard, and the matching sauce does not fit my appetite.On the contrary, the overall feeling of SAUSE with truffle potato strips can be stronger.

Pergor black loose dew soup can smell the strong truffle aroma without the entrance, and the consistency of saltiness is just right.

Campania Marseille Soup, sour fragrance has reached a very good level, and the fish pieces are not loose.The more you drink, the smoother.

Japanese ink sauce roasted sea urchin stewed rice. When eating sea urchin alone, the flavor is light and sweet. The outside of the stewed rice stew is soft but still keeps the taste of rice core. When the two are sent to the entrance, it seems to have chemical effect The sea urchin's seafood is stimulated by the stewed rice of ink sauce.

Norwegian Salmon Milk Milk Sauce is stewed. The stewed rice is maintained well.

Nanfa truffle is cooked into steak stew, no attempt, skipping.

American carbon -roasted beef cake, crispy cake skin, the base sauce flavor with beef thin slices complement each other, unknowingly eliminated ...

Queen Fuji Apple Porter, when the table was served, the sweet and scent of the cinnamon and cinnamon was very strong. Each bite could be eaten into a diced apple flesh. After eating.

Baked roasted liquor stir -fry twd299
Provence small round method TWD149
South American black truffle potato strip TWD149
Perigor Blackson Lulong Decoction TWD250
Campania Marseille Fish Soup TWD250
Japanese ink sauce roasted sea urchin stew twd699
Norwegian Salva Milk Milk Sauce Stew rice TWD399
Nanfa truffle cooked steak stew twd399
American carbon -roasted beef cake TWD300
Queen Fuji Apple Apple Porte Twd300

The overall meal experience is good, and the overall level of food is above the standard. The waiter will help us with the most appropriate time according to the progress of our meal.During the process, the store's additional introduction to the chef Havana hot sauce provided to our chef is very layered, and it feels that everything is available!I can't help but buy a group of home!
But except for this sauce, although other foods are delicious, they don't seem to be amazing.

Visit Agusto again. On Friday night, the feast of food is here. Southern truffle fries are different from the general ways of truffle potato strips in the workshop. In particular, the fries have no truffle flavor. Transformation. Moving salmon and salmon eggs. The salmon is very soft and slightly with the aroma of cream, followed by truffle steaks. The scorching crispy and elastic meat on the surface of the steak has a contrast. Rich.Japanese -style firewood flower branches, a very delicious pancake, has the aroma of beauty, and the seafood of the firewood flower branches. The beauty administrative chef also prepares Havana hot sauce for customers who like spicy food. , Very exciting and delicious.French Earl Basque cake, the executive chef specially explained to taste it quickly, in order to taste different changes from cold to room temperature, and each bite also has a different degree of flavor.
The restaurant will change the menu every season, and I am very recommended to taste the memorable food.

recommend:
1. The service staff is very professional and kind
2. Make hot sauce and thick soup, lobster deserves to be a signboard
3. Use less creamy cream and replace them with cheese and eggs. The taste is comfortable
4. Signing on scallops, lobster and other signboards
I will recommend friends to visit overall

The space is high and wide, the seat interval is very comfortable, and the feeling of meals is very comfortable.

The red and white wine recommended by the waiter is very smooth, especially with meals and complementary effects. The white sauce stew is very fragrant, and it will soon be eaten with white wine.

Every meal makes people feel very attentive. The salmon stewed salmon is cooked in five points. The skin is fried very crispy, but the meat is very soft and tender. It is the flavor of the rock salt imported from Sicily. It is not dead and salty and has a sense of layering. I really want to continue it after eating!

Everything is good, desserts are superb ç”œ

The environment of the meal is a little lazy, the seat is wide and the service is good.
Let's talk about the taste of the meal. The ingredients are fresh and unquestionable, and the chef's technique has transformed the deliciousness of the meal into a satisfying appetite.Tulu steaks are tender and juicy, and truffles are ticked.Chi Hai is not in large amount, but it can lead to the sweetness of scallops.Dessert is that I think that in addition to the chef market, I have the best dessert in the existing existing existing existing dessert. Although it is called a cheese cake, the silky taste makes me amazing, sweet but not greasy. EssenceLooking forward to visiting again!

EN:
This is the second time I have come to this restaurant for dining.When I first came, I decided to come again the next day because I chatted with friends and didn't taste meals well.What attracted me was the Boston Lobster here. The two spent more than 3,000 yuan. Although the price is not cheap, it still decides to experience it again.

This time we ordered a Boston lobster, and we also ordered a comprehensive seasonal vegetable.The lobster is very fresh, and there is a water tank in the restaurant. You can see live lobsters. This makes people feel that the ingredients are very guaranteed.The restaurant may be because they have just opened, so there are not many people.When I first came, I was told that there was a restriction on meals at the time of order. I was a little hesitant, but because there were no other choices, I decided to take a look.After coming, I found that the restaurant was not full, and naturally it would not urge the guests to leave, which allowed us to enjoy the food leisurely.

The quality of lobster is really good, the meat is fresh and juicy, and the taste of cooking is great. Whether it is cooking or grilled, you can feel the chef's intentions.Comprehensive time vegetables are a surprise.This dish contains a variety of vegetables, which are rich in types and sufficient portion. It is a healthy and delicious dish.This dish is not only colorful, but also a good taste. Let us enjoy enough vegetable nutrition while enjoying seafood.

It may be because of the new opening of the restaurant. The service staff looks less experienced, but they are very cute and the service attitude is very enthusiastic.Although there are some small mistakes in the process of ordering and serving, it is still a pleasant dining experience as a whole.

In summary, the Boston lobster and comprehensive seasonal vegetables in this restaurant are recommended. The ingredients are fresh and the cooking is attentive. It is a pleasant gourmet experience.It is hoped that the restaurant will continue to improve service quality in the future and attract more customers.I believe that over time, this restaurant will be more and more loved by diners.
